name: La Vita Nuova (alpha build)
description:
You wake up to find yourself in the dark corridors of a girl's mansion. You came here without consent, but maybe it's for your own good...

FEATURING

cute girls!

an original soundtrack!

multiple endings!

CONTENT WARNINGS

BLOOD

GORE

THEMES OF ANIMAL ABUSE 

MURDER

KIDNAPPING

This is not the final build of the game. What you experience may be subject to change in the final build.
